name: General Purpose VM
description: Balanced compute, memory, and networking for a wide variety of workloads.

name: High-Performance VM
description: Optimized for compute-intensive workloads requiring high CPU performance.

name: Memory-Optimized VM
description: High memory-to-vCPU ratios for memory-intensive applications.

name: GPU Accelerated VM
description: High-performance GPUs for machine learning, AI training, and inference.

name: ML Training Platform
description: Fully managed platform for training machine learning models at scale.

name: AI Inference Engine
description: Deploy and serve machine learning models with low latency.

name: Block Storage
description: High-performance block storage that can be attached to any VM instance.

name: Object Storage
description: Scalable object storage for unstructured data with global accessibility.

name: Virtual Private Cloud
description: Secure, isolated cloud network with customizable IP ranges and subnets.

name: Content Delivery Network
description: Global CDN for fast content delivery with edge caching.
